content.raw:
Awesome!

As for the transparency affecting the visual, I think we can leave this as an open issue. On gzclient, I believe we work around this using the [GZ_VISIBILITY_GUI](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/58fbe39d9e90bcfabc9f4a2ba911ce934b29b66a/gazebo/rendering/Visual.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default#Visual.hh-510) flag and handling that as things are made transparent. I'd consider this a very minor issue.
content.html:
Awesome!

As for the transparency affecting the visual, I think we can leave this as an open issue. On gzclient, I believe we work around this using the GZ_VISIBILITY_GUI flag and handling that as things are made transparent. I'd consider this a very minor issue.
